page.title: 05FARMING IN BADENOCH - 2
page.content:
The farms in this area are either {owned}by the farmer or{leased,}the lease usually being passed from father to son. Following a sound practical upbringing on the farm many sons (or daughters) now attend college or university studying agriculture and thus adding academic training to a natural interest. As the nearest vet is based some{thirty}miles away these farmers having benefitted from a broad education can cope with many animal maladies on their own.
{Stock sales}are held in nearby Kingussie on{four}occasions each {autumn}by the Aberdeen and Northern Mart. These sales are well attended and are considered a social highlight by farmers and shepherds, a rare chance to catch up with friends, some of whom live in quite isolated areas.
